name: microsoft-office-365-feed
label: Microsoft Office 365 Feed
description: Ingest the IP, URLs used by Office 365 using the web service provided by Microsoft. The fetched indicators can be used to create a whitelist, blacklist etc. for your SIEM or firewall services.\nThis connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Regions
fields.description: The regions from which to fetch indicators. Supports multi-select. For all regions, you need to select each region.
fields.name: regions

fields.title: Services
fields.description: The services for which to fetch indicators. For all services, select the “All” option.
fields.name: services

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Fetch Indicators
operations.description: Fetch an IP Address and URL indicator(s) from the Microsoft Office 365 feeds.

parameters.title: Indicator Type
parameters.name: indicator_type
parameters.description: Type of indicator that you want to fetch from Office 365 feeds.Valid types include: IPs, URLs and Both.

parameters.title: Modified After
parameters.name: last_pull_time
parameters.tooltip: Value as an Epoch Timestamp. Indicators data will be returned only if the feed has been refreshed after this time.
parameters.description: Value as an Epoch Timestamp. Indicators data will be returned only if the feed has been refreshed after this time.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Control the number of indicators by limiting feeds count in a single request. Note: Pagination option is not available.
